title: Sleep Headphones, 3D Sleep Mask Bluetooth Wireless Music Eye Mask, LC-dolida Sleeping Headphones for Side Sleepers Sleep Mask with Bluetooth Headphones Ultra-Thin Stereo Speakers Perfect for Sleeping
descriptions:
Sleep Headphones, 3D Sleep Mask Bluetooth Wireless Music Eye Mask — LC-dolida Sleeping Headphones for Side Sleepers

Overview:
Discover deeper, more restorative rest with a 3-in-1 solution that combines Bluetooth sleep headphones, an ultra-comfortable 3D contoured eye mask, and total light blocking. Designed for side sleepers and anyone who needs peaceful, uninterrupted sleep, this LC-dolida mask delivers HD stereo sound, zero eye pressure, and an ergonomic fit that stays comfortable all night.

Key Features:
- 3-in-1 Design: Bluetooth sleep headphones + sleep mask + light-blocking eye mask for an all-in-one sleep solution.
- Bluetooth 5.2: Fast pairing, stable connection, and low power consumption; works with most Bluetooth-enabled devices.
- HD Stereo Sound: High-fidelity audio with immersive soundstage for music, podcasts, or white noise.
- Long Battery Life: 8–10 hours of playtime on a 1–2 hour charge—lasts through the night.
- Side-Sleeper Friendly: Ultra-thin, cushioned speakers and a low-profile design for comfortable side sleeping.
- 3D Contoured Eye Cups: Zero eye pressure and a true blackout fit that prevents light leakage.
- Ergonomic, Adjustable Fit: 3D ergonomic shaping with a fully adjustable strap to suit different head sizes.
- Premium Materials: Soft, breathable, skin-friendly memory foam and fabric; hypoallergenic for sensitive skin.
- Cool and Comfortable: Breathable construction helps regulate temperature for comfort in any season.
- Hands-Free Listening: Built-in controls for volume, track, and calls—no fumbling with your phone in the dark.

Performance:
- Wireless Range: Up to 45 feet.
- Battery/Charging: 8–10 hours playtime; 1–2 hours to full charge.
- Compatibility: Pairs with most smartphones, tablets, and Bluetooth-enabled devices.

Designed For:
- Better Sleep and Naps: Ideal for insomnia and light-sensitive sleepers.
- Travel and Relaxation: Perfect for air travel, meditation, and yoga.
- Sensitive Conditions: Helpful for migraine relief and dry-eye sufferers needing full light blockage.

Why You’ll Love It:
- True blackout with zero eye pressure for deeper sleep.
- Stable, clear audio without bulky over-ear or in-ear discomfort.
- Thoughtful, side-sleeper-centric design that stays comfortable all night.

Gift-Ready:
A cool tech gadget and a unique, practical gift for men, women, teens, moms, dads, and more. Great for Christmas, Valentine’s Day, birthdays, Halloween, Easter, Mother’s Day, Father’s Day, and Teacher’s Day.

What’s in the Box:
- LC-dolida 3D Bluetooth Sleep Mask with Built-in Headphones
- Charging Cable
- User Guide

Care Tips:
- Spot clean the fabric as needed; remove or shield electronics per instructions before cleaning.
- Adjust strap to achieve a snug, light-blocking seal without over-tightening.

Sleep better, travel smarter, and relax deeper with the LC-dolida 3D Bluetooth Sleep Headphones Mask—the comfortable way to block light and drift into immersive sound, anywhere.
